mapper.select: select USER_ID from tbl_project_group_user where USER_POST = 8 and STATUS = 1

SELECT pgu.USER_ID from tbl_project_group_user pgu LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group pg ON pgu.PROJECT_GROUP_ID = pg.ID and pgu.`STATUS` = 1 and pgu.USER_POST in (8,10) LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON pg.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID and pg.`STATUS` = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_project_system prosys ON prosys.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID and pg.`STATUS` = 1 LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info sys ON prosys.SYSTEM_ID = sys.ID and prosys.`STATUS` = 1 AND prosys.RELATION_TYPE = 1 where sys.ID = #{systemId} and sys.`STATUS` = 1
